text.description:
Taji and Coolr eat lunch together at least four times a week. But it’s always a challenge to find a place, due to Coolr’s very specific diet restrictions. Coolr is celiac, which means he has to have a dairy-free, gluten-free diet. He’s also allergic to shellfish. So naturally, Taji decided he’d be the perfect person to bring to one of Yelp’s worst-rated buffets, with hundreds of items on the menu.
Things could go either way on this one. Coolr could leave satisfied, with a full stomach... or in an ambulance.
Watch more One Star Reviews: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDbSvEZka6GHgTPhrChu9GGP21k802Y7h
Click here to subscribe to VICE: http://bit.ly/Subscribe-to-VICE
0:50 Finding the Buffet 3:02 The Royal Hibachi Grill & Buffet 4:10 Meet the Chef 5:10 Testing the Food 8:05 Addressing the Reviews 10:40 Taji's Review

Browse the growing library and discover corners of the world you never knew existed. Welcome to VICE.
